curated_text: Symbol: TSLA. Year: 2022. Period: Y2022. ReportType: K10. Section: Competition and Market Position. This section discusses competitors, market dynamics, and regulatory landscape.  Competitors mentioned: the Securities and Exchange Commission, SEC, Mobile Service, the Fremont Factory, the Model S and Model X, Tesla Roadster, FSD, Energy Generation and Storage Energy Storage Products Powerwall and Megapack, Solar Energy Offerings, Solar Roof, Vehicle Control and Infotainment Software, FSD Computer, Autopilot, Energy Generation and Storage Energy Storage Products, Solar Energy Systems, Powerwall., Energy Generation and Storage Our, Automotive Direct Sales Our, Tesla, Tesla Superchargers, Superchargers, Tesla Wall Connectors, Energy Generation and Storage, Powerwall, Warranty Automotive Service, Tesla Mobile Service, Vehicle Limited Warranties, Energy Generation and Storage We, Financial Services Automotive Purchase Financing, Manufacturing Manufacturing Facilities, Panasonic, Governmental Programs. Context excerpt: competition, future operations and production capacity, future financial position, future revenues, projected costs, profitability, expected cost reductions, capital adequacy, expectations regarding demand and acceptance for our technologies, growth opportunities and trends in the market in which we operate, prospects and plans and objectives of management. The words “anticipates,” “believes,” “could,” “estimates,” “expects,” “intends,” “may,” “plans,” “projects,” “will,” “would” and similar expressions are intended to identify forward-looking statements, although not all forward-looking statements contain these identifying words. We may not actually achieve the plans, intentions or expectations disclosed in our forward-looking statements and you should not place undue reliance on our forward-looking statements.
